name: Windows Partition Recovery Software
tagline: Suitable Solution to Recover Data from Corrupted Windows Partition
body:
Is your Windows partition gets corrupted? MS Windows program make use of hard drive in order to keep entire data in well organized manner. However, it is true that over time connected with computer system usage issues can occur within the systems due to damage in its hard drives. Due to this, data of Windows partition may also goes in unworkable condition.

There are some many symptoms which alert you that your hard drive gets corrupted which makes your data inaccessible like: Invalid media type reading drive, file system is displayed as Raw, sector not found etc. In such conditions, it becomes necessary to [recover data from corrupted Windows partition](http://www.en.datarecoverysoftware1.org/recover-corrupt-windows-hard-drive-data.html).

## Apply Simple Way to Get Back Data from Affected Windows Partition:

If you want to get your data without any harm then, avoid doing any manual tip or trick. It is suggested to take help from external professional application which can tackle these situations and retrieve files from corrupted Windows HDD or partition. There are so many tools are available in online market which claims for data recovery from Windows HDD partition. Windows partition recovery software is one of the excellent applications as it has simple GUI techniques and provides safe methods to do this task.

Windows hard drive recovery software has the potential to get back your vital corrupted, deleted and formatted partition data without any complexity. You can completely remove corruption from hard drive files via its "**Normal Recovery**" mode. If you need to restore those files which were deleted or permanently deleted using shift+del command, then simply apply its "**Deleted Files and Folders Only**" mode and get all your items with original format. It also provides "**Formatted Partition Recovery**" recovery mode for those users who need to get their important records from formatted/re-formatted volumes.

### Download Free Demo and Self-Evaluate the Tool:

In order to test Windows HDD file recovery tool, you can simple download its free trial version and examine softwareâ€™s functionality and working procedure that how this tool can recover data from corrupted Windows partition. In addition, tool also supports to recover external storage devices. Run this application on all Windows operating systems.
